name: Chicken Burgers
author: Cheerios
summary: A tasty chicken burger that has spices added to it to make a good burger to eat with a salad, or you could add it to soups or casseroles to make them stretch further.
ingredients: 4 slices whole-grain bread, torn into chunks
directions: Process bread in a food processor until you have fine bread crumbs
Stir bread crumbs, oats, salt, mustard, celery seed, and cumin together in a bowl
Mix chicken, onion, and egg together in a separate bowl; add bread crumb mixture to chicken mixture and mix
Divide and shape mixture into 7 patties
Heat canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook patties in hot oil until browned each side and no longer pink the center, about 5 minutes per side
